website_summaries.verdict: A best buy for those in the market for a small shot glass that has a classic style.
pros: Users find these shot glasses sturdy, nicely designed, and simple but stylish
They are a good choice for those looking for a smaller 1.5-ounce shot glass set rather than the 2-ounce size
cons: others commented on minor imperfections in the glass

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Just received the shot glasses and thought they were just really dirty but it looks like they had a design on the inside before and it was taken off. I wanted to use them for stock photography but not usable since they look dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Low quality glass...won't work for etching
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shot glasses as a gift and planned to etch a design into them. The glass quality is not great and has some strange wavy areas. I used glass etching cream and it gave patchy, inconsistent results...even after multiple attempts. If you just want a cheap, plain, shot glass, these will do, but they are not great by any means.
customer_reviews.author: K. LaRoach

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are dirty and smell horrible for something that is supposed to be new. You can see the marks from where the old decals used to be and read the writing clearly. Useless to me for what I wanted them for.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful piece of glass and would definitely qualify as a classy presentation. The bottom of the glass is heavy and very durable. Although not everyone would use them in the same fashion as I do which is cool chemicals to a precise temperature, they hold that temperature out of the container for my experiments and had no problems with cracks or breakage even with this harsh use. I would certainly purchase these again from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: kayle zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great, little shot glasses!
customer_reviews.text: My husband "stole" our only two shot glasses for his purposes, and I needed to replenish our shot glass supply, (you should always have a few shot glasses around) so I found these wonderful, little shot glasses from Thirsty Rhino! (Cute name!) They are a great value, and they are not made from thin glass, but from a thicker glass, and they are very durable. I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Moondancer

customer_reviews.title: Not shot glasses that weigh four ounces empty!
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinarily thick shot glasses in my opinion are silly as hell. A heavy weight makes the contents taste better? Of course shot glasses can be made too thin. But these guys IMHO are Goldilocks. Plenty thick, clear, and feel good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Survived a fall from a high cabinet to the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Got these a couple of months ago. Just stopped by to leave this review because I’m amazed at the quality. I had them piled on top of each other in a high kitchen cabinet but had them right in the front... I grabbed a cup from the back and knocked the shot glasses over. So they fell all the way from the cabinet... one fell on the counter and one fell all the way to the floor. I was like oh no!!! Because I automatically assumed they were done. And nope, not a scratch. I was amazed that they survived such a great fall. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luffysan

customer_reviews.title: ... of my glasses was broken but the others are good.
customer_reviews.text: one of my glasses was broken but the others are good.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Stand up strong
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shot glasses. I was looking for shot glasses without a logo. My wife placed a couple of these in our bathroom for use with mouthwash. The other two are in my liquor cabinet. Sturdy and heavyweight so they don’t tip over easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: wanted 2 price made be buy 4
customer_reviews.text: i ended up with 3. one was cracked upon arrival. although the packaging was excellelnt and im sure it doesnt happen that often as i was impressed how well they were packaged. no complaints here just happy to get 3 heavy shot glasses. salute.....
customer_reviews.author: jime simpson

customer_reviews.title: Make Great Airbrush Mixing Pots
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small and low cost glass container to use for mixing thinned paint for my airbrush. A friend suggested off-handedly that I look at shot glasses. These work great for what I need. They are made perfectly smooth, no seem/mold-line and are crystal clear. Because they are a nice smooth texture, even enamel paints wash out with minimal effort. While not what they were intended for, the fact that they put up with my abusive use means they will work just fine as normal shot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: B.R.Weisensel

customer_reviews.title: there is nothing not like this Shot Glass
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing not like this Shot Glass, it's great product i use everyday for my Cappuccino Machine, worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: doodi20

customer_reviews.title: Well made shot product...
customer_reviews.text: This is appears to be a very well made shot glass. The glass is clear and thick. It is heavy and weighted on the bottom. I haven't had an opportunity to use it yet but it looks like it will do the job well without tipping when pouring in the product.
customer_reviews.author: DRH

customer_reviews.title: Basic shot glasses, they get me drunk
customer_reviews.text: Your basic run of the mill shot glasses but they get me DRUNK! They get the job done and nice price. Would recommend if you want basic shot glasses for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Its shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: They're shot glasses. They work perfectly for taking shots and when I dropped one in my drunken stupor it didn't break so that's a win. The price was good as well. I'd definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Well made, perfect shape & weight, attractive
customer_reviews.text: Well made, perfect shape & weight, attractive. No bubbles in the glass & shine up nicely for any bar display. Nice & heavy, classy & classic appearance. Happy to buy just 4. Great addition to your bar & mixology gear.
customer_reviews.author: PolarPro

customer_reviews.title: ... finding the right way to display them in a pretty fashion and this was my solution
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my little flossers out on my bathroom counter to encourage my using them but wasn't finding the right way to display them in a pretty fashion and this was my solution! It's the perfect little size to fit those flossers in there and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quickly, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good size and weight. Perfect to have on hand for get together. Glasses need a good washing with detergent and hot water. Manufacturing leaves a filmy coating on glasses.
customer_reviews.author: j rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just needed some of these for my apartment. I don't use them very often, but they seem well made for the price. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: money_michaels

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, they hold a perfect shot of espresso or alcohol. Come out great from the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: JeeperGirl

customer_reviews.title: These are very well made and look nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Now I won't have to keep hand washing my shot glasses, having six is useful for when you 're serving different types of alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: Give these a shot!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Very good set, not too expensive....so if the party gets out of control, you wont care about missing shot glasses or broken one!
customer_reviews.author: FunGuy

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my espresso maker. They work beautifully. Very attractive glasses. Would use for many things (Including mini mini mousse for desserts)
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for. They glasses are study but nice looking at a great price in comparison to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Tuft

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight for shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Came safely and securely, very well packaged. They are very light for a shot glass, I expected them to be heavier on the bottom based on the image but they're not. They slide around on my espresso maker when it's running so they didn't meet my need but I have no gripe about them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Holds liquid.
customer_reviews.text: These tiny glasses hold 1.5 ounces of your favorite liquid. They don't leak or anything. After a few refills they can be hard to accurately pour liquid into- quite the small target when pouring from a half empty 1/5..
customer_reviews.author: zero

customer_reviews.title: I mean what can I say, its a shot ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean what can I say, its a shot glass. It arrived intact and on-time, but dirtier than you would expect a new product to be. -1 one star for cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: chmod 777

customer_reviews.title: Basic - but that's fine
customer_reviews.text: Dead basic, boring, you're entertaining guests and need to make sure you have enough for shot time type glasses. They arent fancy, but for this low price and delivery to the doorstep, I am perfectly fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parker

customer_reviews.title: who would give these as a gift
customer_reviews.text: they're not gift-like at all i hate gifts anyway i bought these for myself
customer_reviews.author: regular_reviews

customer_reviews.title: Keto Shots!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a drinker, but these work fine for our two daily shots of coconut oil. Shame there's no coconut oil flavored Jello.
customer_reviews.author: leebosay

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and feel. Clean glasses that belong in a bar with friends taking a responsible shot now and then. Cheers!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: They look exactly as the picture. I haven't used them yet, but they look very durable. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: One was broken but otherwise okay
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 2 stars because one of them came cracked and broken even though they were wrapped individually in bubble wrap pockets.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Good shot glasses. Only thing is I was cleaning one and it broke in my hand. But they're gonna be thin naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Samy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this glasses to replace the ones in my house that were broken. So far I'm pleased. Everything was VERY WELL packed. Each glass was in its own bubble wrap sleeve.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much, they are very cute. I purchased them for a shot board and I think they will be perfect.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised

customer_reviews.title: Good product.

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!
customer_reviews.text: There is only one of me and I didn't want the normal bar style shot glass. These have a heavy bottom but are more dainty than the bar style.

customer_reviews.title: Great little set!
customer_reviews.text: I got these last night as a gift for a friend who has just entered college and they're great! They came in a small box split in four with cardboard, each glass bubble wrapped. Thicker glass bottom ensuring they won't tip!

customer_reviews.title: Solid standard shot glass

customer_reviews.title: Great for espresso shots

customer_reviews.title: One showed up broken... but overall they're OK for the price

product_meta.title: Thirsty Rhino Karan, Round 1.5 oz Shot Glass with Heavy Base, Clear Glass, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:4The Thirsty Rhino Karan is your classic profile shot glass. Made of smooth clear glass with a heavy glass base. Take a shot and let's celebrate!
feature_bullets: Round 1.5 oz shot glass, sturdy clear glass construction, classic shot glass shape
Heavy solid glass base, perfectly balanced to prevent tipping and spilling
Dimensions: 2.25 inches tall x 2 inches top diameter x 1.3 inches base diameter

Perfect for: whiskey, tequila, vodka, espressos, desserts, party decorations, gifting, bars, hotels, restaurants, night clubs, catering, home, kitchen, housewarming, birthday, wedding, anniversary, retirement, graduation, congratulations, baby shower, job promotion, stocking stuffers, bachelor and bachelorette parties, festivals, Secret Santa, White Elephant, Christmas, New Years, Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, St. Patrick's Day, Halloween, Mardi Gras, Oktoberfest, Spring Break
